root.name: max()

example.code: int a = max(5, 9); // Sets "a" to 9 int b = max(-4, -12); // Sets "b" to -4 float c = max(12.3, 230.24); // Sets "c" to 230.24
int[] list = { 9, -4, 230.24 }; int h = max(list); // Sets "h" to 230.24

root.description: Determines the largest value in a sequence of numbers.
